channel.title: Developer on Kevin Cui
channel.description: Recent content in Developer on Kevin Cui

item.title: I'm A Tester & I'm A Rubber Duck
item.description: Photo by Silvia Maggi “I’ll be there for you, like I’ve been there before; I’ll be there for you, ‘Cause you’re there for me too.” [1] I’m a tester. When a developer talks to me, I see myself as a rubber duck. A rubber duck? Why not Winnie-the-Pooh, Pikachu or Minion? Because the color doesn’t matter ðŸ˜‰ But other things do matter. I’m a tester, a rubber duck, you are a developer.
